info_sevan <- read.csv("sevan.csv") 

info_artik <- read.csv("artik.csv") |>
  filter(time > "2024-06-18")

  filter(time > "2024-06-18")

#info_sevan |> 
 # ggplot(aes(x = days, y = humidity)) + geom_line()

chart <- rbind(info_gavar, info_sevan, info_azatan, info_artik, info_ashotsk, info_panik, info_maralik) 

chart2 <- chart %>%
  drop_na(humidity) %>%
  mutate(days = as.Date(time)) %>%
  group_by(device, days) %>%
  summarize(humidity = mean(humidity))


chart2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = days, y = humidity, fill=device)) + geom_line(aes(color=device), size = 1.2)
